code: import*as types from'./../constants/actionType';export var listAll=function listAll(){return{type:types.LIST_ALL};};export var addTask=function addTask(task){return{type:types.ADD_TASK,task:task};};export var toggleForm=function toggleForm(){return{type:types.TOGGLE_FORM};};export var closeForm=function closeForm(){return{type:types.CLOSE_FORM};};export var openForm=function openForm(){return{type:types.OPEN_FORM};};export var updateStatus=function updateStatus(id){return{type:types.UPDATE_STATUS,id:id};};export var deleteTask=function deleteTask(id){return{type:types.DELETE_TASK,id:id};};export var editTask=function editTask(task){return{type:types.EDIT_TASK,task:task};};export var updateTask=function updateTask(task){return{type:types.UPDATE_TASK,task:task};};export var nullTaskEditing=function nullTaskEditing(){return{type:types.NULL_TASK_EDITING};};export var filterTable=function filterTable(filter){return{type:types.FILTER_TABLE,filter:filter};};export var searchList=function searchList(keyWord){return{type:types.SEARCH_LIST,keyWord:keyWord};};export var sortList=function sortList(value){return{type:types.SORT_LIST,value:value};};
